meanings.definition: A group of extinct reptiles that lived millions of years ago.
meanings.sent1: Many children love learning about dinosaurs in school.
meanings.sent2: Scientists study fossils to learn more about dinosaurs.
meanings.sent3: The dinosaur costume at the party was a big hit with the kids.
meanings.sent4: The old museum exhibit felt like a room full of dinosaurs.
meanings.sent5: The movie portrayed dinosaurs as majestic creatures roaming the earth.

meanings.definition: Something that is outdated or obsolete.
meanings.sent1: Using a typewriter nowadays is like using dinosaurs in the office.
meanings.sent2: Fax machines have become dinosaurs in the world of communication.
meanings.sent3: His flip phone seemed like a dinosaur compared to the latest smartphones.
meanings.sent4: The old computer felt like a dinosaur next to the new model.
meanings.sent5: The ancient cassette player was a true dinosaur in the age of streaming music.
